Articles.Content:
Starting building this sucker about 2 years ago, got to the point where it was almost finished too.  Then my Hard Drive in my computer crapped out, and i hadnt saved any pictures of the progress i had made that were recoverable.   Now here we are again, I am almost halfway done now but the lag is horrendous!  I have 2 more panels in orbit, waiting for a rendezvous manuever.  Currently i get a verey low frame rate, but im hoping the new update will help with that, once they get all the bugs sorted out.          

    Someday i would love to Recruit a video maker dude to help me make an actual commercial with this.  The finished sign will say  "Kerba-KolaGivesLife"  double-sided.   Then, i want to put ANOTHER space banner in a retrograde orbit that says "DrinkTwang" and see if we cant crash em together and get it on video.  Or, at the very least it might summon a Kraken or two.  but thats cool too.  I have a pic with the lifter attached, pre take-off,  but its a night time pic.  I can throw it up too if anyones interested how i Brute-Forced this SOB into orbit.
